# 7. # 7. Limitation of Liability
7.1. [bold]Enforcement of Rules[/bold]: Players found violating the TOS may face disciplinary action, including but not limited to: - Warnings, temporary suspensions, or permanent bans. - Character deletions or progress resets.
7.2. [bold]Appeals Process[/bold]: Players who believe they have been unfairly penalized may appeal disciplinary actions through the official channels. - Appeals will be reviewed, but the final decision rests with the Sector 14 moderation team. - Sector 14 reserves it's right to deny appeals on staff discretion.
